sections.EXECUTION:
Instructions
1) Spouses will be escorted across the tank trail from Bunker DZ to the PMI area
2) At the PMI area, each spouse will validate that they can load, fire, and clear the M4 before moving to the firing point
3) Each spouse wear proper PPE and be paired one-to-one with a range safety and escorted to their lane; the M4 and ammunition will already be stationed at the lane
4) Spouses will load and fire one 30-round magazine at bobber targets between 50m-150m
5) Once complete, a dedicated range safety will clear the M4 and ensure it is oriented downrange; the safety will take accountability of all ammunition and magazines at the firing point; the spouse will then move back to the PMI area until the range is complete
Backside Support Requirements
Personnel: 19 Total
Ammo NCO, 2x Soldier
2x Gate Guards
8x Range Safety (E4+)
Medic, Driver
2x Road Guard
OIC/NCOIC: 1LT Dunn, SSG Dummer
Equipment:
12x M4
36x Magazines
4x ASIP
Foam Ear Protection
RFIs / Friction Points
What PPE are spouses required to wear (helmet, IOTV, gloves)?
Can SSG Dummer and SGT (P) Daum be OIC/RSO to allow 1LT Dunn to participate in the event with his spouse?
No spouse will be permitted to carry an M4 or magazine on the range; all equipment remains at the firing line with the safeties.
Can we update the training request support form to include paper targets so the spouses can take a souvenir home?
CBRN Chamber
Camp Normandy
8x lanes
RTE from Bunker DZ
PMI area
150m
100m
50m
Ammo Point
